title: Downing Street says Starmer still has ‘confidence in his top team’ after Rayner and Mandelson departures – UK politics live
summary: Scotland Secretary Douglas Alexander expressed that MPs are deeply affected by Rayner's departure. He emphasized the strong sense of loss felt among his colleagues. This sentiment highlights Rayner's significant impact on the team.

title: What you need to know about Covid vaccines in the US this fall
summary: The FDA has approved a new vaccine shot, receiving support from RFK Jr. However, it’s only available to specific groups of people. Details on eligibility and distribution locations are provided for interested individuals.

title: Charlie Kirk shooting latest: Trump says ‘with high degree of certainty’ suspect is in custody
summary: The President gave an interview with Fox News at their New York studio, where he shared his insights and remarks on various issues. The conversation highlighted key policies and his administration's priorities. This interview is part of the President's ongoing media engagements to connect with the public.

title: Guardiola says Trafford ‘the keeper for City’; Wissa, Ramsey and Delap face injury layoffs – live
summary: Barry Glendenning provides updates on the Premier League as it resumes after the international break. Fans can expect the latest news and insights regarding teams and players. Join him for comprehensive coverage of the league's developments.

title: Poland says Russia’s drone incursion ‘wasn’t a mistake’ after Trump’s speculation – Europe live
summary: Donald Trump indicated on Thursday night that a situation might have been a mistake, appearing dismissive about its significance. His comments seemed to downplay the matter. Details regarding the context of the statement were not provided.
